name: Brumal Blood
description:
An interactive fiction game about a government employee, you, who yearns for the end of winter.

Brumal Blood follows a day in the life of a government worker in a fictional country which has been stuck for several years in a seemingly endless winter. 

- Stare out at the snow!
- Have uncomfortable conversations in cars!
- Convince yourself you have a crush on a coworker!
-  The government understands you!

I had to rush to get this game finished on time so it doesn't look very aesthetically pleasing yet, I'll go in soon and snazz it up!
_______________
Cw: Unhealthy non-relationships, Unsettling imagery, Death (no gore)
Credits: All writing and cover art done by me.
